system.description: The system managing command. Do /system help to get more informations

help.description: Gives help for the subcommands of "system" command

optionsDesc.name: The name of your system (max. 64 characters)
optionsDesc.color: The color of all the embeds related to the system (i.e. #123456)

optionsDesc.avatarUrl: A URL to an image that will represent your system (incompatible with avatar-attachment)
optionsDesc.avatarAttachment: An image that will represent your system (incompatible with avatar-url)
